subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Midfielder Jermaine Jones, who blasted a second-half goal to tie the game at 1-1, gets the highest grade in an evaluation of the individual performances by the Americans.
snippet: Midfielder Jermaine Jones, who blasted a second-half goal to tie the game at 1-1, gets the highest grade in an evaluation of the individual performances by the Americans.
